channel.title: Does lowering xp gained make you hit lower?
channel.description: Does lowering xp gained from attacking stuff make you hit lower and more realisticly? Or does it just lower xp? If it does just lower xp i would like to know how to make you hit more realisticly, sorta like delta.

item.description:

im using allstar lol

item.title: Does lowering xp gained make you hit lower?
item.dc:creator: @Nima304 Nima304
item.description:
@Nima304 wrote:

no lmao

you have to lower the armor/wepon bonuses in item.cfg, THEN you will hit lower

lowering the xp rate just makes you level slower

Read full topic
